text: Amazing food comes out quick too. Enchiladas with the red sauce are so good especially with the Salvadoran horchata yum! Not to pricey either would recommend!

Excelentes tamales de pollo con real toque salvadoreño,  las pupusas muy ricas y me gusta eso que se puede comer la promoción de 12 pupusas por $12 ahí mismo, además el trato super especial y muy bonito y limpia el lugar. Ahí les doy 5 estrellas.
Servicio excelente, muy rapidos y amables.  Las pupusas no estan grasosas y saben riquisimas, la horchata salvadoreña sabe muy deliciosa.  Los fines de semana habra karaoke y dj.

Tried to go to get pupusas on a Saturday night. I called at 8 to make sure they were open and the number is out of service so I drove over there and got there at 8:20 and the door was locked so they were closed. The sign by the door even said open till 9
New ownership i believe called El paraiso restaurant Rosibel and Alexis were very helpful and great attitude. Good customer service and food is prepared upon arrival fresh pupusas.
